title: share link will not clear in firefox settings.
content: I went to right click on a open tab to share it with somebody. The share link has many unwanted choices. I wanted to clear those. So I went to Firefox settings Cookies and Site Data to clear everything in the cache, it will not remove them. Any help greatly appreciated.
creator: BlueShoes

title: Certificate Error only on Firefox only on one computer
content: Firefox is giving me an error on https://stemgateway.nasa.gov but the site is perfectly accessible using MS Edge and using Firefox on another computer. I uninstalled and reinstalled Firefox, changed the proxy settings to not use a proxy, tested a VPN, and changed DNS servers. Below is a picture of the error and of the certificate which seems to be present in Firefox already.

title: Firefox audio stuttering

title: How can I create a profile to log into a Mozilla account?
content:
Hello everyone,

I use an unchanging Firefox profile, and would like to synchronize tabs using Firefox Sync. How can I create a profile that logs me into a Mozilla account on startup? I tried using a fixed `signedInUser.json`, but that didn't yield any success.
creator: notcancername
